message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for it.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $10500 for the product.

I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13000, which is the lowest I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11000 for the product.
